Filter out .pub keys

Search for identity files using id_*.pub wildcard

Instead of using hard-coded "id_rsa" and "id_dsa" filenames.

Besides the use of ecdsa and edsa keys this also allows the use of
other network-specific keys if they follow this naming convention.

Refs #86.

Merge pull request #47 from stengaard/env-ordering

Env vars should be ordered
re-order file putting the most important concepts on top
Override the old value instead of relying on order
better naming

Env vars should be ordered

Since maps in go are by definition in random order environment variables
could not rely on a previously defined value to be present. This
addresses that problem by introducing an ordered map type.

This fixes #10

Add SUP_NONCE to default variables

SUP_NONCE is a value that is unique per invocation and can be used to
orchestrate layered deployment strategies across a fleet of hosts.

Merge pull request #30 from lexa-uw/master

Fix for "Bad file descriptor on localhost" #24
fix for Bad file descriptor on localhost #24

Added exclude option to upload and removed options from remote tar

* With the exclude option is possible to avoid some directories to be compressed,
avoiding unecessary use of resources and speeding up the upload task

* Removed options from remote tar execution, the options --totals and --checkpoint,
sometimes those options aren't available in remote tar implementation

Added default environment variables SUP_NETWORK and SUP_HOST

* SUP_NETWORK contains the name of the current network in use
* SUP_HOST contains the address of the current host in use
Add link to example Supfile to the DEMO section
